DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the safety, tolerability and efficacy of deoxycholic acid injection in the reduction of submental fat (fat below the chin).
DOC.brief_title: Deoxycholic Acid Injection Submental Fat (SMF) Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) and Subject-reported Outcome Measures Study
DOC.criteria: Moderate or severe submental fat Dissatisfaction with submental area History of stable body weight Signed informed consent Any medical or other condition that would affect subject safety or evaluation of efficacy Previous intervention in the submental area
